column6:
Ghost Rider, a militant, gun-toting sheriff and a possessed-by-Lucifer Jack O'Lantern. Mix them all up, shake...and stand back. It's bad vs. evil vs. crazy in a free-for-all that will leave the town of Sleepy Hollow forever changed--if it leaves it standing at all.,2007,3
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Dan Brown | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Javier Saltares | penciller:Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
